Hello

I'm Mike, a front-end developer & designer. I gratuated from Edinburgh Napier University in 2010 and after traveling the entire east coast of Australia I returned to London and began self employment. I moved back home to Dublin in 2014 and continued to work freelance building interactive responsive websites and desiging marketing material for clients. Mid 2015 I started working for Nettl as a Brand Stylist. In my free time I design posts for my blog page.

Let's get social...
